oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Numerical simulation of a cod end net - part 1: Equilibrium in a uniform flow
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Le Dret, H
Lewandowski, R
Priour, Daniel
Chagneau, F
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Numerical simulation
Nonlinear conjugate gradient
Elastic networks
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, a cod-end fish net is modelled by a discrete finite network. The nonlinear elastic energy for such a structure is defined and studied. Numerical simulations of the equilibrium state are performed by minimizing the total energy. The minimization algorithm uses a general nonlinear conjugate gradient procedure.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Journal of Elasticity (0374-3535) (Kluwer), 2004-08 , Vol. 76 , N. 2 , P. 139-162
